eventDecorators.name: CalculateFee
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when fees are calculated.

eventDecorators.name: DeliverRelay
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the relay tokens are traded for `amount0` of gton swaped for native tokens via '#routeValue' `amount1` of native tokens sent to the `user` via '#routeValue'.

eventDecorators.name: Lock
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when native tokens equivalent to `amount` of relay tokens are locked via `#lock`.

eventDecorators.name: RouteValue
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when data is routed.

eventDecorators.name: SetCanRoute
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the `parser` permission is updated via `#setCanRoute`.

eventDecorators.name: SetFees
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when fees are set via '#setFees'.

eventDecorators.name: SetIsAllowedChain
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when permission for a chain is set via '#setIsAllowedChain'.

eventDecorators.name: SetLimits
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when limits are set via '#setLimits'.

eventDecorators.name: SetOwner
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the owner changes via #setOwner`.

eventDecorators.name: SetRelayTopic
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the RelayTopic is set via '#setRelayTopic'.

eventDecorators.name: SetWallet
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the wallet is set via '#setWallet'.

functionDecorators.name: canRoute
functionDecorators.description: Look up if `user` can route data to balance keepers.

functionDecorators.name: feeMin
functionDecorators.description: minimum fee for a destination.

functionDecorators.name: feePercent
functionDecorators.description: percentage fee for a destination.

functionDecorators.name: gton
functionDecorators.description: relay token.

functionDecorators.name: isAllowedChain
functionDecorators.description: chains for relay swaps to and from.

functionDecorators.name: lock
functionDecorators.description: Trades native tokens for relay, takes fees, emits event to start crosschain transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: destination
parameterDecorators.description: The blockchain that will receive native tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: receiver
parameterDecorators.description: The account that will receive native tokens.

functionDecorators.name: lowerLimit
functionDecorators.description: minimum amount of native tokens allowed to swap.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: User that can grant access permissions and perform privileged actions.

functionDecorators.name: reclaimERC20
functionDecorators.description: Transfers locked ERC20 tokens to owner.

functionDecorators.name: reclaimNative
functionDecorators.description: Transfers locked native tokens to owner.

functionDecorators.name: relayTopic
functionDecorators.description: topic0 of the event associated with initiating a relay transfer.

functionDecorators.name: routeValue
functionDecorators.description: Routes value to balance keepers according to the type of event associated with topic0. receiver is always same as sender, kept for compatibility.

parameterDecorators.name: uuid
parameterDecorators.description: Unique identifier of the routed data.

parameterDecorators.name: chain
parameterDecorators.description: Type of blockchain associated with the routed event, i.e. "EVM".

parameterDecorators.name: emiter
parameterDecorators.description: The blockchain-specific address where the data event originated.

parameterDecorators.name: sender
parameterDecorators.description: The blockchain-specific address that sent the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: receiver
parameterDecorators.description: The blockchain-specific address to receive the tokens.

functionDecorators.name: router
functionDecorators.description: UniswapV2 router.

functionDecorators.name: setCanRoute
functionDecorators.description: Sets the permission to route data to balance keepers. Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: setFees
functionDecorators.description: Sets fees for a destination.

functionDecorators.name: setIsAllowedChain
functionDecorators.description: allow/forbid chain to relay swap.

functionDecorators.name: setLimits
functionDecorators.description: Sets limits for a destination.

parameterDecorators.name: _lowerLimit
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum amount of native tokens allowed to swap.

parameterDecorators.name: _upperLimit
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum amount of native tokens allowed to swap.

functionDecorators.name: setOwner
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`_owner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: setRelayTopic
functionDecorators.description: Sets topic0 of the event associated with initiating a relay transfer.

functionDecorators.name: upperLimit
functionDecorators.description: maximum amount of native tokens allowed to swap.

functionDecorators.name: wnative
functionDecorators.description: ERC20 wrapped version of the native token.
